imdb.plot outline: Set in the contemporary times in a small town in northern India, Bajrangi is an action-comedy animation TV series (11 min episodes) of friendship, fun and togetherness. The story is centered around the life of a young 9 years old boy called Ankush, who is rather meek and lives with his Parents. One fine day, a mysterious nine-year old boy named Bajrangi (child Hanuman) enters their lives and changes their lives forever. Visible only to Ankush, Bajrangi is fun and adorable. A glutton when it comes to food, Bajrangi also knows how to share and how to care. To top it all he also has some magical, mythical powers to fly and to increase or decrease his size at will that gets blended well with his hi-tech, bejeweled multipurpose. Mace(Gadaa) and his long, prehensile Tail that can do anything and everything when needed. Aside from his dependable and helpful nature, Bajrangi is extremely naughty and constantly plays pranks since he is not visible, giving rise to much fun and laughter. Bajrangi is supposed to be immortal and belongs to thousands of years in the past but he takes to the 21st century like fish to water but with some very amusing and endearing consequences.
imdb.title: Selfie with Bajrangi
plot: Set in the contemporary times in a small town in northern India, Bajrangi is an action-comedy animation TV series (11 min episodes) of friendship, fun and togetherness.::Amit Pandey

Set in the contemporary times in a small town in northern India, Bajrangi is an action-comedy animation TV series (11 min episodes) of friendship, fun and togetherness. The story is centered around the life of a young 9 years old boy called Ankush, who is rather meek and lives with his Parents. One fine day, a mysterious nine-year old boy named Bajrangi (child Hanuman) enters their lives and changes their lives forever. Visible only to Ankush, Bajrangi is fun and adorable. A glutton when it comes to food, Bajrangi also knows how to share and how to care. To top it all he also has some magical, mythical powers to fly and to increase or decrease his size at will that gets blended well with his hi-tech, bejeweled multipurpose. Mace(Gadaa) and his long, prehensile Tail that can do anything and everything when needed. Aside from his dependable and helpful nature, Bajrangi is extremely naughty and constantly plays pranks since he is not visible, giving rise to much fun and laughter. Bajrangi is supposed to be immortal and belongs to thousands of years in the past but he takes to the 21st century like fish to water but with some very amusing and endearing consequences.::Amit Pandey
